Text:
function ERU_EP04_20()
    -- .転-4【12月第4週】「それでも手を伸ばす」
    SaveData.Title = "それでも手を伸ばす"

    -- //BG：姫神邸廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,true)
    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0678.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】苦笑
 "It feels like Marika threw me again after such a long time. It really... hurt." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0679.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "Heh, losing to Marika's technique is just karma catching up." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san leaned against the wall and spoke with distant eyes. I stepped closer to her and demanded the true meaning behind her earlier words. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "What do you mean by 'too late'?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "Please tell me where Arumeria-san and the others are. I really want to help them no matter what." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san looked at me with eyes full of sympathy. ]])

    MSG([[ What on earth does this mean? ]])

    MSG([[ She's neither frustrated nor saddened. She just keeps looking at me with an indescribable expression. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0680.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "They're in the children's room past this hallway. But... you better not meet them." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0681.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "Like I said before, it’s already too late. The Arumeria you know is probably no longer there." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "What do you mean by that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t understand what Daria-san was saying at all. ]])

    MSG([[ They’re there but not there? What she’s saying doesn’t make any sense. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing my confusion, Daria-san began to explain thoroughly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0682.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 "Hermes and Arumeria are a split personality pair, completely separate persons. Because of that, memories are divided by personality, and one can be active while the other rests." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "Arumeria-san herself said that. I was surprised to learn people like that exist." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0683.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 "Yes, under normal circumstances that’s impossible. It’s like running two operating systems on one PC." ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria-san spoke about this in detail the night I stayed at Akira’s house. ]])

    MSG([[ The difference from normal split personalities is that Hermes isn’t separated from Arumeria, but an entirely new personality born inside her. ]])

    MSG([[ Their memories aren’t shared, and their consciousnesses are completely separate. When one is awake, the other is often asleep. ]])

    MSG([[ From what I heard, it’s almost like two girls sharing a single body. ]])

    MSG([[ Arumeria herself described it as if a new twin sister had been born inside her heart. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0684.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "If such a twisted state continued, what would a normal person do? They’d try to remove what’s unnecessary, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "Remove what’s unnecessary...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I had a bad feeling. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes is in the next room. But Arumeria isn’t. ]])

    MSG([[ Could it be—that means— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0685.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 "You figured it out. Yes, Hermes’ body is now trying to unify the personalities by erasing Arumeria’s personality, which is the source of the distortion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0686.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 "No, saying a personality is erased is a bit misleading. More precisely, they ‘‘merge.’’ We call this process ‘personality integration.’" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "W-why is that happening...? Can’t that ‘personality integration’ be stopped!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0687.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "We have been trying to stop it all this time. But as I said earlier, since splitting is a distortion, if we keep stopping it, eventually both will break." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0688.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "This pattern is unprecedented globally. We’ve been researching desperately but found no way to prevent ‘personality integration.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0689.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "If we force the integration, both Hermes and Arumeria’s personalities could be destroyed. That’s why Arumeria chose to be absorbed by Hermes herself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "So that means... even if I managed to get Arumeria-san out of this house now, ‘personality integration’ couldn’t be avoided?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "One of Arumeria-san or Hermes-san’s personalities absolutely had to disappear!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0690.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 "...Exactly. Even knowing the truth, nothing can be changed. That’s why I wanted you to remain unaware." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 "T-that's just..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "I don’t believe that. It’s not decided that Arumeria-san will disappear yet!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I shouted as if telling myself not to lose hope. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "I don’t fully understand the principle of ‘personality integration,’ but both Arumeria-san and Hermes-san must have a chance to remain!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "As long as there’s even the slightest hope, I won’t give up!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0691.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】焦り
 "E-Erika-kun—" ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    MSG([[ I ran off without listening to Daria-san’s words anymore. ]])

    MSG([[ Split personality? Personality integration? I don’t understand these difficult things. I don’t want to. ]])

    MSG([[ But what I do understand is that Arumeria-san surely doesn’t want to disappear. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like when we spent time with Akira. Like when we went on a date. ]])

    MSG([[ She must still want to keep smiling. ]])

    MSG([[ I just couldn’t accept that she would disappear—no matter what. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_21")
end
